attributes.action: truly uphold his intent to form a government of 'all the talents' with fair and equal representation for both business and workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown claims to want to head a government of 'all the talents'. In order for Gordon to truly represent this country as a whole, he must now surely also invite union officials or working class representatives onto his team, so that workers have the same access and influence in government as Digby Jones gives the business community. Fair's fair, Gordon!
